modName: HDT Equipment V0.2 for Everone with Belly and Collision
summary: This is an Edit of HDT Equipment 0.2 i made, I completely redid the breast physics i added the belly nodes and added the data need for collision data to work with the havok object
descriptionHtml:
This is an Edit of HDT Equipment 0.2 i made, I completely redid the breast physics i added the belly nodes and added the data need for collision data to work with the havok object

Have added a Dual Redux version but warming this will replce you skeletons & weapon placements.


[size=4][b]Requirements:[/b][/size]

[size=3][b]All Versions Require:[/b][/size]
[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?][b]HDT Physics Extensions[/b] by HydrogensaysHDT[/url]﻿ - Physics engine. Latest version.[/*]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][b]SKSE[/b][/url] - Skyrim Script Extender. Latest version.[/*]
[*][url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/676-xp32-maximum-skeleton-extended/]XP32MXE Skeleton[/url]﻿ - The Skeleton i built the belly and breast physics around.
[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armour for CBBE & HDT[/url]﻿. the HDT body included in this armor mod was the body i used when creating this edit.
[/*]
[/list]
[b][size=4]Credits:
[/size][/b]
Orignal Credits go to mod author IceKK whose work can be found here
[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57408/?][color=#3c78d8][size=3]HDT ﻿Equipment v2.0[/size][/color][/url]
[/*]
[/list]
I just edited there original file to better suit my needs.
author: Carloss32
